identity.mission: Create a 'Midnight Terminal' aesthetic that feels like a professional Bloomberg/institutional tool, not a generic SaaS dashboard.
principles: Fusion: Mix 'Cyberpunk' neon with 'Swiss' grid precision.
Density: High data density is a feature, not a bug. Traders need information.
Contrast: Deepest blacks vs. Neon signals. No mid-gray mush.
Motion: Micro-interactions only. No slow fades. Instant feedback.

rules: Use 'Chivo' for all Section Headers and KPI Labels (font-weight: 900 for big numbers).
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for ALL financial data, prices, and percentages.
Use 'Inter' for UI labels, tooltips, and long text.
Uppercase: All 'Overline' labels (e.g., 'MARKET STATUS') must be uppercase, text-xs, tracking-widest.
Dashboard must use a dense BENTO GRID (CSS Grid).
Gap: gap-2 or gap-4 (Tight spacing for data correlation).
Containers: No rounded corners > 4px. Sharp edges preferred.
Borders: 1px solid border-white/10. No shadows in dark mode.

overrides.style: rounded-sm font-mono uppercase tracking-wider text-xs h-8
rounded-none px-2 py-0.5 font-mono text-[10px] uppercase

components.shadcn_customization: Modify /app/frontend/src/components/ui/card.jsx to remove default shadows and increase border contrast for dark mode.

backgrounds.description: Abstract dark data grid for login or hero background

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts link to /app/frontend/public/index.html immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'terminal' color palette.
3. GLOBAL CSS: In index.css, set body background to #050505 and text to #fafafa.
4. COMPONENT AUDIT: Go through Shadcn components and remove 'rounded-xl' or 'rounded-lg'. Change to 'rounded-sm' or 'rounded-md' for a sharper, professional look.
5. CHART INTEGRATION: When building the Chart component, ensure the container has 'relative w-full h-full' and the chart resizes automatically.
6. DATA-TESTID: Every interactive element (buttons, inputs, chart toggles) MUST have a data-testid attribute (e.g., 'buy-button', 'timeframe-selector').
7. FILE EXTENSIONS: Use .js and .jsx. Do not use .ts or .tsx.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid deep blacks.
Do not center text. Left align is standard for data.
Always use 'JetBrains Mono' for prices and percentages.
